- Add status to Task class

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: create todos, events and deadlines
commitResults.messageBody:
- allow users to create 3 different types of tasks: todos, events and deadlines
- create these new classes inheriting from task and make task class abstract

- write tests for text-ui-testing
- change ACTUAL.txt file name in .gitignore
- create DukeException class to handle errors related to Duke

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: add factory methods to create tasks
commitResults.messageBody: - add factory methods in task, todo, deadline and event classes to create tasks
- add error handling for wrong user inputs

commitResults.messageTitle: chore: add tests for error handling
feat: allow tasks to be deleted
commitResults.messageBody:
- add delete command to allow tasks to be deleted
- add changeTaskStatus function to reduce duplicate code

commitResults.messageTitle: chore: add tests for delete tasks

- add tests for deleting tasks
- format styling of output text
- use enums to represent valid user commands

- use message declared in Exception and use getMessage() to get the error message
- fix test cases after changing error messages
